description:
With the thanks of Yotsugi Ononoki, Koyomi and Mayoi were able to escape from the “darkness.” Within the ruins of the cram school that they escaped to, Shinobu is consulted about the “darkness.” She starts to speak of what happened 400 years ago.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鬼物語 しのぶタイム 其ノ貳
